hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash set -euo pipefail
cp /usr/local/docker-config/dictionary/dictionary.env .env
# Resolve the facet loader configuration payload path # Priority: # a) FACET_LOADER_CONFIG_PATH env var # b) workspace-local facet_loader_configuration.json # c) default: /usr/local/docker-config/dictionary/facet_loader_configuration.json
PAYLOAD_FILE=""
if [[ -n "${FACET_LOADER_CONFIG_PATH:-}" && -f "${FACET_LOADER_CONFIG_PATH}" ]]; then PAYLOAD_FILE="${FACET_LOADER_CONFIG_PATH}" elif [[ -f "./facet_loader_configuration.json" ]]; then PAYLOAD_FILE="./facet_loader_configuration.json" elif [[ -f "/usr/local/docker-config/dictionary/facet_loader_configuration.json" ]]; then PAYLOAD_FILE="/usr/local/docker-config/dictionary/facet_loader_configuration.json" else echo "ERROR: facet_loader_configuration.json not provided and not found at default path: /usr/local/docker-config/dictionary/facet_loader_configuration.json" >&2 exit 1 fi
echo "Using facet loader payload: ${PAYLOAD_FILE}"
# Optional: basic JSON validation if jq is available if command -v jq >/dev/null 2>&1; then if ! jq empty "${PAYLOAD_FILE}" 2>/dev/null; then echo "ERROR: Payload file is not valid JSON: ${PAYLOAD_FILE}" >&2 exit 1 fi fi
docker stop dictionaryetl || true docker rm dictionaryetl || true
docker run -d \ --name dictionaryetl \ --env-file .env \ -p 8086:8086 \ --network dictionary \ --network picsure \ hms-dbmi/dictionary-etl:latest
echo "Waiting for DictionaryEtlApplication to start..." MAX_ATTEMPTS=6 SLEEP_INTERVAL=5 ATTEMPT=1
while ! docker logs dictionaryetl 2>&1 | grep -q "Started DictionaryEtlApplication"; do if [[ "${ATTEMPT}" -ge "${MAX_ATTEMPTS}" ]]; then echo "DictionaryEtlApplication failed to start within $((MAX_ATTEMPTS * SLEEP_INTERVAL)) seconds." >&2 docker logs dictionaryetl || true docker stop dictionaryetl || true docker rm dictionaryetl || true exit 1 fi echo "Attempt ${ATTEMPT}: Application not started yet. Retrying in ${SLEEP_INTERVAL} seconds..." sleep "${SLEEP_INTERVAL}" ATTEMPT=$((ATTEMPT + 1)) done
echo "DictionaryEtlApplication has started!"
# Note: The Facet Loader controller is mounted at /api/facet-loader/load and expects application/json. # The service is exposed on localhost:8086 per the container run config above.
HTTP_CODE=$(curl --silent --show-error --fail \ --retry 10 \ --retry-delay 5 \ --retry-all-errors \ --retry-connrefused \ -o /tmp/facet_loader_response.json \ -w "%{http_code}" \ -X POST \ -H "Content-Type: application/json" \ --data-binary @"${PAYLOAD_FILE}" \ http://dictionaryetl:8086/api/facet/loader/load)
echo "Facet loader response (HTTP ${HTTP_CODE}):" cat /tmp/facet_loader_response.json || true
docker restart dictionary-api
docker stop dictionaryetl || true docker rm dictionaryetl || true
